text: bulsinjadeul-eun man-il hananim-ui tteus-i iss-eossdamyeon ulido geuligo u li seonjodeuldo geubun-uie daleun geos-eul seomgiji ani haess-eulila ttohan uli neun eotteon geosdo geumgihaji ani haess-eulilago geojishalyeo hanola geudeul i jeon-ui bulsinjadeuldo geulihayeoss-euna seonjijadeul-eun mesejileul jeonhaneun immu-ilppun-ila
